about_the_game:
Welcome to the Shuffle. It's gonna be a long night...

Mau² is a Roguelite inspired by classic games such as Mau-Mau, Crazy Eights, and Uno! Games spanning generations, continents and cultures, well-known by many people.

Enter The Shuffle, a club in which its patrons play a game not of gambling or luck, but pure skill. Match colors and numbers with the top of the pile in order to clear your hand and end the round on your terms! But beware, for at the end of the round, when the scores are tallied, you might end up being the loser after all!

Discover a rich tapestry of unique strategies, interactions, and an array of side cards to serve your goal of becoming the winner of tonight's games! Find ways to game the system, edit your deck, remove all the chaff and play only the best of the best.

Choose your opponents! Who says you have to take only the beaten path? Find which of the patrons you're up against would be easiest for you to beat, and leave nothing but wipe outs in your wake.

But just remember, kind patron. The bartender is always watching. And who knows? If you get good enough... She might challenge you herself.

Features

  • Dozens of unique cards to add to your deck and modify your strategy with!

  • A symmetrical roguelite! Your opponents can and will employ the same cards and strategies that you can use.

  • A Side Deck consisting of cards built to further bolster your plays, with plenty of options to work with!

  • A unique array of mechanics, challenging you to get the victory by any means necessary!

  • 5 rounds of twists, turns, plays and counterplays, and more!

  • A selection of starting decks to give you a head start against your opponents!

short_description: Mau² is a deck builder Roguelite based on classic games such as Mau-Mau and Uno. Get as many points as possible to guarantee your victory even if you don't clear your hand, and upgrade your deck to make sure you always stay on top.
